Title: Frankenstein
Plot: When our Spies happen upon a mysterious Lost-style hatch in the school grounds, they find a KORPS device designed to create super soldiers and Frank is accidentally transformed into a dangerous, bulked-up, FRANK-enstein! The Team and new recruit Keri, must protect the school from the unexpected enemy that is Super Soldier Frank and save his humanity before it it's too late!
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification.  Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
